title: At the front: 1939-1945
creator_credit: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia and Annice Vass
brief_description: A compilation of Cinesound and Movietone Newsreels featuring footage from World War II including Prime Minister Robert Menzies’ declaration of war in 1939, the AIF at Benghazi, the Coral Sea Victory, the Australian Women’s Army Service and other momentous events including famous war footage shot by Damian Parer.
creator_credit_for_label: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia and Annice Vass
